content: Chris Desjardins is a visiting assistant professor of statistics at St. Michael’s College. His research interests include R, statistical graphics, and statistics education.

title: Chris Desjardins
Emotion regulation and cortisol reactivity during a social evaluative stressor: A study of post‐institutionalized youth
